content: this smart crochet couch arm cover combines the timeless appeal of granny squares with the warmth of red heart yarn stitched in red heart all in one granny square you ll practice granny stitch granny square working in rounds working in row chain and double_crochet techniques more than practical this protector infuses your living room with a touch of nostalgic charm red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m frigid 2004 1 ball 4 granny squares or 200 yds/183 m note 1 ball will make 2 arm cozies measurements to fit square couch arm approx 6 15 cm wide by 10 25 5 cm long
